text.*:
This list of national postal services shows the individual national postal administrations of the world's states. All countries, with the exception of Bosnia and Herzegovina, have a single national postal service.

Contents

  • 1 Africa
  • 2 The Americas
  • 3 Asia
  • 4 Europe
  • 5 Oceania
  • 6 See also
